About Me

I’m an AI Instructor and developer with a focus on smart agriculture, medical diagnosis systems, and AI awareness. I teach AI concepts to university students and children, build smart farm systems, and lead AI workshops tailored to different fields. I also create educational robotics projects for kids.

Experience

AI Instructor & Community Founder

Freelance / Self-Started

Founded an AI awareness initiative offering interactive sessions, practical workshops, and personalized tools for daily use, work, and study. Led sessions for medical, engineering, and humanities students using free and practical AI tools.

Smart Agriculture Developer

Graduation Project

Developed a smart system for monitoring cattle behavior to detect early signs of disease and improve productivity. Focused on disease symptoms and predictive deep learning models.

LangChain App Developer

AI Simulation Project

Built an application simulation using LangChain, focusing on debugging, context awareness, and workflow design. Integrated AI chat into practical use cases.

Robotics Instructor for Kids

Online Teaching

Taught robotics and coding fundamentals to children, including components, motors, sensors, project planning, and upgrading robot functions.

Interests

Apart from my AI teaching and development work, I enjoy mentoring kids in robotics, launching awareness projects, and helping others integrate AI into their daily life, studies, and work.
